name: Blind Survival Online Demo
description:
This is the online demo for Blind Survival. An audiogame that has something for everyone! The game is being developed by a visually impaired person and can also be seen as a work of self expression. 

This demo only contains the tutorial, but the downloadable version has a lot of content!

  • Play with a controller, keyboard & mouse or just a keyboard!
  • The first parts of the storymode!
  • Different methods of combat!
  • Multiple gamemodes: Survive for the longest time in endless, hone your skills in training and see how far you can run in the tunnel.
  • Patreons gain access to the new story content while it's being developed, along with the exclusive scavenge mode!
  • Loads of achievements to earn!
